name: azure-sqldb-failover-group
description: Azure SQL Database Failover Group Service

metadata.displayName: Azure SQL Database Failover Group Service
metadata.longDescription: Azure SQL Database auto-failover groups (in-preview) is a SQL Database feature designed to automatically manage geo-replication relationship, connectivity, and failover at scale.

plans.name: SecondaryDatabaseWithFailoverGroup
plans.description: Online secondary database with a new failover group, read-only, same size to the source database.

plans.name: ExistingDatabaseInFailoverGroup
plans.description: Register an existing database in a failover group as a service instance. It won't be deleted in deprovisioning.
